price: Hanyuma rwose muri buri gatsiko tuzakuremo abarushije abandi kwigomeka kuri (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe (babe ari bo babanza guhanwa).
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عِتِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: thumma lananziʿanna min kulli shīʿatin ayyuhum ashaddu ʿalā al-raḥmāni ʿitiyyan
